mapper.select: select user_id,user_name,user_pwd,user_phone, user_sex,user_face,user_regTime,province_id,city_id, county_id from person_user order by user_id
select user_id from person_user where user_name=#{username}
mapper.insert: insert into person_user(user_name, user_pwd, user_sex, user_phone, province_id, city_id, county_id, user_face, user_regTime) values (#{user_name},#{user_pwd},#{user_sex},#{user_phone}, #{province_id},#{city_id},#{county_id},#{user_face},#{user_regTime})
